title: (x) Futuristic round geometric font - Curver {Mike F}
content:
Any idea? Reminds me of contour and/or micr fonts... But nothing I could identify so far.  
I can provide some more samples(of lesser quality sadly) if needed.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [additional.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130315120627/http:/typophile.com/files/additional.png) | 1.79 KB |
author: Paul-Kenji Cahier

comments.content: Phew, that's not very good, is it? Maybe a freeware font or a custom design by a not so talented person. Either that or it was very badly rendered.
Bad render indeed, but shouldnt be too much of a bother for identification;) Sounds like maybe a freeware font, kind of reminds me of that freeware japanese foundry, grey graphics.
